Body:
"""
    When making graphs, test node creation function.
    """
g = nngt.Graph(100, name='new_node_test')
assert g.node_nb(
    ) == 100, "Error on '{}': invalid initial nodes ({} vs {} expected).".format(
    g.name, g.node_nb(), 100)
n = g.new_node()
assert g.node_nb(
    ) == 101 and n == 100, "Error on '{}': ({}, {}) vs (101, 100) expected.".format(
    g.name, g.node_nb(), n)
nn = g.new_node(2)
assert g.node_nb() == 103 and tuple(nn) == (101, 102
    ), "Error on '{}': ({}, {}, {}) vs (103, 101, 102) expected.".format(g.
    name, g.node_nb(), nn[0], nn[1])
pytest.mark.mpi_skip
